snippet: Two Los Angeles County sheriff’s deputies accused of punching, kicking and pepper-spraying an inmate, then falsely claiming that he attacked them, have been indicted on federal charges amid an investigation of the country’s largest jail system.
abstract: Mariano Ramirez and Joey Aguiar, Los Angeles County sheriff’s deputies accused of punching, kicking and pepper-spraying an inmate, then falsely claiming that he attacked them, have been indicted on federal charges amid an investigation of the country’s largest jail system.
lead_paragraph: Two Los Angeles County sheriff’s deputies accused of punching, kicking and pepper-spraying an inmate, then falsely claiming that he attacked them, have been indicted on federal charges amid an investigation of the country’s largest jail system.

headline.main: California: Two More Deputies Are Charged in Jail Investigation
headline.print_headline: California: Two More Deputies Are Charged in Jail Investigation
